languages.text: Has lower base RoF, but increases it by 2 for each Burst fired from this gun (up to +10)

traits.locale_text: Has lower base RoF, but increases it by 2 for each Burst fired from this gun (up to +10)

languages.text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

languages.text: Когда персонаж стреляет {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} из этого оружия, его {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} увеличивается на 2 (максимальный прирост — +10). Суммируется и длится до конца боя.

traits.locale_text: Когда персонаж стреляет {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} из этого оружия, его {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}скорострельность{/g} увеличивается на 2 (максимальный прирост — +10). Суммируется и длится до конца боя.

languages.text: Kullanan kişi, bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} yaptığında silahın {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} +2 (en fazla +10) artar. Üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Kullanan kişi, bu silahla {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}seri saldırı{/g} yaptığında silahın {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}atış hızı{/g} +2 (en fazla +10) artar. Üst üste birikir ve çatışma sonuna dek sürer.

languages.text: 使用者がこの武器で{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃を行う際、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が+2増加する。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2. Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 使用者がこの武器で{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}バースト{/g}攻撃を行う際、{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}発射速度{/g}が+2増加する。この効果は戦闘終了までスタックし、継続する。

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur exécute une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} avec cette arme, sa {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} augmente de +2 (jusqu'à un maximum de +10). Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'utilisateur exécute une attaque en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g} avec cette arme, sa {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadence de tir{/g} augmente de +2 (jusqu'à un maximum de +10). Cet effet est cumulable et dure jusqu'à la fin du combat.

languages.text: Macht der Träger mit dieser Waffe einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriff{/g}, erhöht sich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} um +2 (max. +10). Stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Macht der Träger mit dieser Waffe einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salvenangriff{/g}, erhöht sich ihre {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}Feuergeschwindigkeit{/g} um +2 (max. +10). Stapelbar und dauert bis zum Ende des Kampfes an.

languages.text: Cuando el portador ejecuta un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} con esta arma, su {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} aumenta en +2 (hasta un máximo de +10). Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el portador ejecuta un ataque de {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g} con esta arma, su {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}cadencia de disparo{/g} aumenta en +2 (hasta un máximo de +10). Este efecto es acumulativo y dura hasta el final del combate.

languages.text: 每当装备者使用这把武器进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}都会提高2点。此效果最多可叠加10次，持续至战斗结束。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wielder makes a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g} attack with this weapon, its {g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}rate of fire{/g} is increased by +2 (up to a maximum of +10). Stacks and lasts until the end of combat.

traits.locale_text: 每当装备者使用这把武器进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}攻击时，{g|Encyclopedia:RateOfFire}射速{/g}都会提高2点。此效果最多可叠加10次，持续至战斗结束。
